scripts.install:all: npm i && npm --prefix UI i --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix mid-tier i --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev: concurrently -n mid-tier,UI --kill-others "npm --prefix mid-tier run start:dev" "npm --prefix UI run start"
scripts.build: npm --prefix UI run build && npm --prefix mid-tier run build
scripts.check-for-updates:all: npx npm-check-updates -u && cd UI && npx npm-check-updates -u && cd ../mid-tier && npx npm-check-updates -u && cd ..
